member.name: T:TimeLog.TransactionalApi.SDK.SecurityHandler
member.summary: Security handler class for transactional API calls

member.name: M:TimeLog.TransactionalApi.SDK.SecurityHandler.#ctor
member.summary: Prevents a default instance of the class from being created.

member.name: M:TimeLog.TransactionalApi.SDK.SecurityHandler.TryAuthenticate(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String}@)
member.summary: Executes an authentication request to the API using the application settings TimeLogProjectTransactionalUsername and TimeLogProjectTransactionalPassword. If successful the token is set to the Token property.
member.remarks: Make sure to set the application setting TimeLogProjectUri.
member.param: Outputs the messages returned from the API
member.returns: A value indicating whether the authentication is succesful

member.name: M:TimeLog.TransactionalApi.SDK.SecurityHandler.TryAuthenticate(System.String,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String}@)
member.summary: Executes an authentication request to the API using the parameters. If successful the token is set to the Token property.
member.param: Username part of the credentials to authenticate with
Password part of the credentials to authenticate with
Outputs the messages returned from the API
member.returns: A value indicating whether the authentication is successful

member.name: M:TimeLog.TransactionalApi.SDK.SecurityHandler.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes the handler.

member.name: P:TimeLog.TransactionalApi.SDK.SecurityHandler.Instance
member.summary: Gets the singleton instance of the .

member.name: P:TimeLog.TransactionalApi.SDK.SecurityHandler.SecurityServiceUrl
member.summary: Gets the uri associated with the security service.

member.name: P:TimeLog.TransactionalApi.SDK.SecurityHandler.SecurityClient
member.summary: Gets the client associated with the security service

member.name: P:TimeLog.TransactionalApi.SDK.SecurityHandler.Token
member.summary: Gets the security token for use in other methods. Make sure to call TryAuthenticate before trying to access this property.

member.summary: Prevents a default instance of the class from being created.

member.summary: Gets the singleton instance of the SettingsHandler.

member.name: P:TimeLog.TransactionalApi.SDK.SettingsHandler.Url
member.summary: Gets the base uri for the TimeLog Project site read from the application setting TimeLogProjectUri.

member.name: P:TimeLog.TransactionalApi.SDK.SettingsHandler.MaxReceivedMessageSize
member.summary: Gets the default max received message size for all calls to the TimeLog Project API. Default is 1024000, but can be overwritten from application setting TimeLogProjectMaxReceivedMessageSize.
